about_the_game:
6 Minute Games


Almost instant respawns and constant action. A casual free game to play solo or with friends with short rounds—and if you get bored just leave—get into a match instantly & no waiting 30 minutes for a game to end.



Paint Warfare takes a refreshing turn away from other more tactical FPS games (and even some movement shooters). Equip a combo of 2 unique abilities to get a specific edge over your opponents



10 Abilities including:
  • Bullet shields
  • Dash
  • Jetpack
  • Grapple Hook
  • Invisibility
  • Turret, etc



  • Climb any wall you see holding the [space bar]
  • Fly across the map with the speed strips and boost ramps
  • Double jump
  • Slide or fall to the ground with [CTRL]





  • Maps:
    13 unique maps to fight on.

  • Game Modes:
    6 gamemodes: Minigame Free for all, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Hunger Games, Point Capture, Hunger Games and private/ custom games!

  • 10 Abilities to unlock, such as:
    • Turret
    • Dash
    • Hang Glider
    • Invisibility
    • Grapple hook
    • Super speed boots
    • Heal
    • Jetpack
    • Enemy Radar
    • Half shield

  • Hats & gun skins:
    Collect coins through getting XP / completing challenges and unlock awesome skins for your rifles and character!

  • Guns:
    Paint Warfare has (almost) everything, from railguns and oranges to spoons, teleporters, gas guns and shotgun pistols. I'm always adding suggestions!


An awesome free game to play with friends! It's easy to join your friend's lobby using the match codes, or you can create your own private game with your own game rules!
detailed_description:
6 Minute Games


Almost instant respawns and constant action. A casual free game to play solo or with friends with short rounds—and if you get bored just leave—get into a match instantly & no waiting 30 minutes for a game to end.



Paint Warfare takes a refreshing turn away from other more tactical FPS games (and even some movement shooters). Equip a combo of 2 unique abilities to get a specific edge over your opponents



10 Abilities including:
  • Bullet shields
  • Dash
  • Jetpack
  • Grapple Hook
  • Invisibility
  • Turret, etc



  • Climb any wall you see holding the [space bar]
  • Fly across the map with the speed strips and boost ramps
  • Double jump
  • Slide or fall to the ground with [CTRL]





  • Maps:
    13 unique maps to fight on.

  • Game Modes:
    6 gamemodes: Minigame Free for all, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Hunger Games, Point Capture, Hunger Games and private/ custom games!

  • 10 Abilities to unlock, such as:
    • Turret
    • Dash
    • Hang Glider
    • Invisibility
    • Grapple hook
    • Super speed boots
    • Heal
    • Jetpack
    • Enemy Radar
    • Half shield

  • Hats & gun skins:
    Collect coins through getting XP / completing challenges and unlock awesome skins for your rifles and character!

  • Guns:
    Paint Warfare has (almost) everything, from railguns and oranges to spoons, teleporters, gas guns and shotgun pistols. I'm always adding suggestions!


An awesome free game to play with friends! It's easy to join your friend's lobby using the match codes, or you can create your own private game with your own game rules!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“This game has a lot of potential. The dev is an experienced video game developer, and is very passionate about this project. He continues to better it and turn it into a fully-fledged shooter, with each new update bringing in a plethora of new features.”
5/5 – Ringer-53

“The unique gameplay with the crazy movement, the weapons and simple character models, the perks and the gadgets all made for a really unique and fun experience, the dev has the potential to make the game one of the coolest and most unique shooters on steam.”
Recommended – Anonymous
short_description: A fast-paced online arena FPS with jetpacks, hang gliders, fast respawns, 6-minute rounds and instant matches
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, French*, German*, Dutch*, Polish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Italian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Afrikaans
*languages with full audio support
